message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair considering the inflation working against me.
Your turn to feel the inflation, Alice. I'll take a slight majority this round.
I understand the inflation is working in your favor, Bob, but let's be realistic. This offer is a compromise, and it's the last one I'm making above 50%.
The tides have turned, Alice.  I'll take the same amount you offered last round, but with me on the better end of the deal now.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. Take this offer and let's end this before we both lose out too much.
